alert.note: Alert for Greene; Laclede; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:42PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Webster, Wright, northwestern Douglas, northeastern Christian, south central Laclede and southeastern Greene Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 642 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Niangua, or 7 miles east of Marshfield, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Springfield, Marshfield, Rogersville, Strafford, Seymour, Sparta, Morgan, Mansfield, Fordland, Hartville, Niangua, Duncan, Diggins, Twin Bridges, Oldfield, Turners, Elkhead, Grovespring, Rader and Linden. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 88 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
